value.title: Link from a Power BI Paginated report to a Power BI report

value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)

value.title: Combine Multiple or All Sheets from an Excel File into a Power BI solution Using Power Query Dynamic
value.excerpt: Combining multiple files from one folder is already supported built-in through the graphical interface of Power Query when use you Get Data from Folder.
